title: 1. Seminar by Bert Collard: Redesigning IRRIs irrigated rice breeding program Pt. 1

tasks.task: Attend and present at a seminar on redesigning the irrigated breeding program at Erie.
subtasks: Understand the history and achievements of Erie's irrigated rice breeding program.
Recognize the challenges faced due to full cost recovery and limited resources.
Acknowledge the changes in funding sources and project focuses.
Explain the shift towards more efficient breeding methods and the adoption of Rapid Generation Advance (RGA) technique.
Describe the process and benefits of RGA in breeding rice varieties.
Discuss the optimization and scaling of RGA operations in greenhouses.
Consider the implications of wet season challenges and tropical greenhouse considerations.
Outline the traditional vs. innovative breeding methods and their applications in field trials.

tasks.task: Subtasks will be further broken down in a step-by-step process as part of the MAINTASK.
